problem.markdown:
>>X is a continuous random variable which is uniformly distributed between 13 and 17. What is the probability that 14 \(\leq\) X \(\leq\) 15.5? (Enter 3 decimal places)<<
= 0.375+-0.003
[explanation] \((15.5-14)/(17-13)=0.375\) [explanation]

numericalresponse.label: X is a continuous random variable which is uniformly distributed between 13 and 17. What is the probability that 14 \(\leq\) X \(\leq\) 15.5? (Enter 3 decimal places)
